title: Beyonce May Play Nala in 'The Lion King' Remake
text:
Beyonce is reportedly the top pick to voice the character of Nala in Disney’s live-action reboot of The Lion King , Variety reports.
Sources told the outlet that the 35-year-old pregnant entertainer -who is currently expecting twins with husband Jay Z – is director Jon Favreau ’s first choice for the role.
While Beyonce will be busy with the pregnancy (she had to cancel her Coachella performance at the advice of her doctors), Jon and the studio say they’re willing to accommodate her schedule.
Beyonce has not yet made her decision.
Donald Glover will voice Simba in the film, and James Earl Jones will be reprising his role as Simba’s father, Mufasa.
